item.title: How do I open a ‘Trump account’? The IRS has one simple solution for you.
item.description: People can’t contribute money to the tax-advantaged accounts for children until July, but they can start the process of opening one now

item.title: This top stock picker spotted Nvidia and GLP-1s early — and made over 200%. Here’s what he’s buying now.

item.title: The diaper wars go deluxe as Pampers, Huggies chase shoppers ready to pay more for premium products
item.description: Pampers parent P&G and Huggies seller Kimberly-Clark, who were once locked in a price war, are now pushing premium versions of their diapers.
